string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Cody's 4 Year Anniversary Party!
#b#p9200000##k is said to be preparing something for MapleStory's 4 year anniversary. I should go see what he's up to.
Cody asked me to get him a #t04001126# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party.\n\n #i04032306# #t04032306# #b#c04032306##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody everyday.

Hello, #b#h0##k! I've been so busy preparing for this party.
What kind of party is it? That's of course Maple's 4 year anniversary party celebration.
There are some things I need for the party but my hands are already full with the preparation. Only if someone could help....
Do you want to help me?

Thanks. What I need is #b#t04032306##k in order to decorate for the finale of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. Make sure you don't forget and please get it for me. You know how many I need, right? It's a 4 year anniversary celebration, so #b4#k! Make sure to bring all of them.

You can get #b#t04032306##k from #r#o9400601##k and #r#o9400602##k inside the Cake dungeon.\nYou can enter the Cake dungeon through the sphinx in NLC. Some seem to refer to it as a giant Yeti instead...\nAlso, don't forget that you can get to NLC, where the Cake dungeon is, through Kerning City's subway.
What am I going to do? This is a very important party that only happens once a year. If you have the time, please help me.

That was faster than I expected. Since you brought me all the materials, I should give you something in return, right?\nI was given a very rare special item for Maple's 4 year anniversary.\nYou're going to love it.
Thank you so much. Do you like the gift?
I need #b4#k of the #b#t04032306##k in order to decorate for the party finale of Maple's 4 year anniversary celebration.\nYou didn't forget that it is Maple's 4 year anniversary, did you?
